notes:
This dataset includes [OpenStreetMap](http://www.openstreetmap.org) extracts for roads in Nepal.  The data is hosted on the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts](http://nepal.piensa.co/) website managed by [GeoFabrik](http://www.geofabrik.de/) and [GFDRR](http://www.gfdrr.org/).  Additional extracts of OSM for different themes are hosted on the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts](http://nepal.piensa.co/) website.  Also, see the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts, Places](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/nepal-openstreetmap-extracts-places) dataset on HDX.

The all_roads.* files include all road/highway/track/path/etc features in the OpenStreetMap database.  The paths and tracks files include subsets of the roads dataset, for [highway=path](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:highway%3Dpath) and [highway=track](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:highway%3Dtrack) respectively.

See the [2015 Nepal Earthquake](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2015_Nepal_earthquake) OSM wiki page for more information on the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) (or HOT) response.

The data is updated every 30 minutes.
